Title: ACER produces two EU LNG price assessments in a week
Description: The European Union's Agency for the Cooperation of Energy Regulators (ACER) launched the new EU LNG price assessment a week ago and was able to produce two such assessments since then as the number of eligible transactions picked up since Jan. 19. This new price assessment is meant to provide more transparency to EU member states and market participants on the price of LNG imports into the bloc.
Author: DE
